trans-unit.target: "如果app有权限,则方法checkSelfPermission()返回PERMISSION_GRANTED,app可以进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Android permission doesn't work even if I have declared it
trans-unit.target: 即使我声明了安卓权限也无法使用

trans-unit.source: As a temporary workaround, drop your targetSdkVersion below 23.
trans-unit.target: 作为暂时的解决方法，请将您的 targetSdkVersion 降至23以下。

trans-unit.source: But if you have created your whole application and don't want to change at every place then a little cheat will be sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 但是,如果你已经创建了你的整个应用,不想在每一个地方都改变,那么稍微作弊就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Check this: https://developer.android.com/training/permissions/requesting.html
trans-unit.target: 检查以下内容：https : //developer.android.com/training/permissions/requesting.html

trans-unit.source: For these permissions, not only does your targetSdkVersion 23+ app need to have the <uses-permission> element(s), but you also have to ask for those permissions at runtime from the user on Android 6.0+ devices, using methods like checkSelfPermission() and requestPermissions().
trans-unit.target: 对于这些权限，不仅您的 targetSdkVersion 23+应用程序需要具有 <uses-permission> 元素，而且还必须在运行时使用 checkSelfPermission() 方法向Android 6.0+设备上的用户要求这些权限。（）和 requestPermissions() 。

trans-unit.source: Get the Activity result as below:
trans-unit.target: 获取活动结果如下。

trans-unit.source: Go to "Build.gradle" file and change the target Sdk version to less than 23, like 22, 21.
trans-unit.target: 进入 "Build.gradle "文件,将目标Sdk版本改为23以下,如22、21。

trans-unit.source: However, eventually, you will have some reason to want your targetSdkVersion to be 23 or higher. At that time, you will need to adjust your app to use the new runtime permission system. The Android documentation has a page dedicated to this topic.
trans-unit.target: 但是，最终，您将有一些理由希望 targetSdkVersion 为23或更高。那时，您将需要调整您的应用程序以使用新的运行时权限系统。Android文档有 一个专用于该主题的页面。

trans-unit.source: I added this to my MainActivity, that resolve my problem
trans-unit.target: 我把这个添加到我的MainActivity中,这就解决了我的问题。

trans-unit.target: 我检查了一下,但我在清单中的权限如下。

trans-unit.source: I hope the solution to write to external storage will be useful too
trans-unit.target: 希望写到外部存储的解决方案也能派上用场

trans-unit.source: I reverted the order of request and it works fine . This was tested with a complete new app(uninstall-> install -> test). The answer may seem weird but just give it a shot .
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我还原了请求的顺序，它工作正常。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">已使用完整的新应用程序进行了测试（卸载->安装->测试）。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">答案似乎很奇怪，但请试一试。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: I searched the internet but all the errors were about the <uses-permission/> syntax, could you help me please?
trans-unit.target: 我搜索了互联网，但所有错误都与 <uses-permission/> 语法有关，请您能帮我吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm trying to write code to send an SMS from an Android app, but when I try to send the SMS it sends me back the error:
trans-unit.target: 我试着写代码从一个Android应用中发送短信,但当我尝试发送短信时,它给我发回了错误。

trans-unit.source: If the app does not have the permission, the method returns PERMISSION_DENIED, and the app has to explicitly ask the user for permission. You need to prompt the user for that permission, as shown in the above code. Calling requestPermissions() brings up a standard Android dialog, which you cannot customize."
trans-unit.target: 如果app没有权限,那么该方法返回PERMISSION_DENIED,app必须明确询问用户的权限。你需要提示用户获得该权限,如上图中的代码所示。调用requestPermissions()会弹出一个标准的Android对话框,你无法自定义。"

trans-unit.source: If the maximum is not enough, there are ways to increases the maximum rate on a rooted device.
trans-unit.target: 如果最大率还不够,可以通过一些方法来提高根基设备上的最大率。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Android version "23" or "23+", then app will show you errors when you are trying to access anything which requires user's permission. You have to ask for permissions at run-time even if you have declared those permissions in Android manifest.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的是Android版本的 "23 "或 "23+",那么当你试图访问任何需要用户权限的东西时,应用程序会显示错误。即使你已经在安卓系统列表中声明了这些权限,你也必须在运行时请求权限。

trans-unit.source: If you are using sdk 23 or higher then you must check run time permissions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的是sdk23或更高版本,那么你必须检查运行时间权限。

trans-unit.source: List of All Permissions Can be Found with Explanation at
trans-unit.target: 所有权限列表可在以下网站找到,并附上说明

trans-unit.source: Manifest.permission
trans-unit.target: Manifest.permission

trans-unit.target: 请通过下面的链接 https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/permissions/overview.html

trans-unit.target: RECEIVE_SMS

trans-unit.source: SEND_SMS
trans-unit.target: SEND_SMS

trans-unit.source: So i had to create an app to send and receive messages but the send action crashed whenever i clicked on send even though the permission was granted . I had requested runtime permissions and allowed them, still i faced a crash that the process doesnt have the requested permission to send SMS . I had checked the granted permissions from :
trans-unit.target: 所以我必须创建一个应用程序来发送和接收短信,但每次点击发送操作都会崩溃,尽管我的权限被授予了。我已经申请了运行时的权限,并允许了他们,但我仍然面临着崩溃的问题,即该进程没有请求的权限来发送短信。我从.NET中检查了授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: Some samples are also available there to get start with the permissions.
trans-unit.target: 一些样本也可以在那里获得权限入手。

trans-unit.source: The big reason for not getting your permission nowadays is because your project has a targetSdkVersion of 23 or higher, and the permission that you are requesting is "dangerous". In Android 6.0, this includes:
trans-unit.target: 如今未获得许可的主要原因是因为您的项目的 targetSdkVersion 为23或更高，并且您所请求的许可是“危险的”。在Android 6.0中，这包括：

trans-unit.source: The order of my request for permissions was
trans-unit.target: 我申请权限的顺序是

trans-unit.source: There is a Security Setting (I checked on CM13) to set SMS Message Limit. If you set this to "None", OS will popup a Dialog for every SMS, even after obtaining SMS_SEND permission in the runtime. Best thing is to set this to maximum.
trans-unit.target: 有一个安全设置(我在CM13上查过),可以设置短信限制。如果你设置为 "无",即使在运行时获得SMS_SEND权限后,OS会弹出一个对话框,每条短信都会弹出一个对话框。最好是设置为最大。

trans-unit.source: To make android more secure now developers has to mention permission in manifest as well as they should have to ask user as well in run time to get the work done. They are permission categorized in dangerous permission section which are mention below
trans-unit.target: 为了使android更安全,现在开发者必须在manifest中提到权限,并且在运行时也必须询问用户,才能完成工作。在危险权限部分中,有以下几类权限,分别是

trans-unit.source: You can use this code to access your messages
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用这个代码来访问您的信息

trans-unit.source: like this way
trans-unit.target: 像这样

trans-unit.source: or edit file build.gradle and chanche number targetSdkVersion less than 23
trans-unit.target: 或编辑文件 build.gradle 和chanche number targetSdkVersion 小于 23

trans-unit.source: request permission pragmatically (after API 23)
trans-unit.target: 务实地请求许可

trans-unit.source: when you declare permisson in Manifest and it's not work means you are performing Task in MarshMallow and for MarshMallow you have set Permisson at RunTime.
trans-unit.target: 当您在 Manifest 声明 permisson 时不起作用，这意味着您正在 MarshMallow 中执行Task ，对于 MarshMallow ,您已在 RunTime 设置Permisson 。
